remarks.format: ## Remarks 新的实例将 WS 联合身份验证的消息序列化到 WS 信任 Feb 2005 协议消息;实例类用于序列化请求的实例类用于序列化响应。The new instance serializes WS-Federation messages into WS-Trust Feb 2005 protocol messages; an instance of the class is used to serialize requests and an instance of the class is used to serialize responses.
